sec.p:
The PF-AHF dataset included estimated or predicted annual mean AHF data for 1970, 1980, 1990, 2000, 2005, 2010, 2015, 2020, 2030, 2040, and 2050. The PF-AHF dataset had two levels of spatial resolution (30 arc-second and 2.5 arc-minute). The uploaded data at the figshare repository were tagged in image file format and included global gridded AHF imagery for 1970, 2015, and 2050
38 . These data can be processed by ArcGIS software, etc. The values of grids represented the annual mean heat flux induced by energy consumption, in W/m 2.
